page.title: 16Religion
page.content: Churches and places of worship in this area are many and varied and over the long years have provided opportunity for the population to follow their own religion.The three main churches within the area are Church of England known as 'High Church'.A few of the churches date back to history of long ago,Whitwell and St. Lawrence Parish Churches dating from the 12th century, but generally as in other parts of the Island there was a great upsurge in the Victorian period to cater for the growing population and indeed the large congregation at that time.In this small area each building has a fascinating story to tell and much research and discovery is taking place and revealing stories of great interest and indeed the personalities that helped to make the History of the community in which they lived.
